name: @FlowReborn-monorepo

scripts.client-build: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build: npm i --workspaces && cd ./packages/client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.render-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client

build: npm run build --workspaces --if-present && npm run test && rm -rf dist && npm run lint && tsc -b
